United Arab Emirates" }, { image:require('../images/dubai.jpeg'), title:"Dubai. United Arab Emirates" }, { image:require('../images/dubai.jpeg'), title:"Dubai. United Arab Emirates" }]; offers. return (

Special Offer

 {offers.forEach} {offer.title}
) } export default Offer
